The new bot climbs out and looks around....He spreads his black bent
wings to full extent. He whips his stinger around a couple of times.
In an instant he knows exactly waht had happened to him and what he
could now do. He realized he had fallen unconcious on his entrace to
earth and his head slammed on the computer of his pod.  The heat had
transfused the computer into his chips and he was now a supergenius.
He had a reason for coming ot earth but the crashed had cleared his
memory.He transformed into a vulture and flew high scouting hte area
with it's keen eye. It could spot  adead bot miles away. Which it
did.At the CF..or at least almost dead. He took off for the battle of
the century.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> The giant ball of fire landed north of the CF somewhere in the Sahera
> desert.  The pod searched for a suitable life form but the bot inside
> was somehow samter than before and intstantly reprogramed it to find
> two suitable bodies.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > Throug the sky above the War at the CF a ball of fire flies through
> > the air lighting up the entire area then dissapears in the distance.
